thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com | 5 of 135
thread.title: Nelda Allen
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Nelda Allen

author: Nelda Allen
title: Nelda Allen
text: I was in the store several times. The salespeople were all cheerful & eager to help. No pressure to buy. Let me look & even helped me measure. The paperwork on the buy & set up for delivery went like clockwork. The delivery went perfectly as well. At this point, it really looks like this furniture was designed with my bedroom in mind! I'm very pleased.
